about_the_game:
PathUp! is an adventure-packed game where you climb to the summit, overcoming challenging obstacles and combining various mechanics to tackle each hurdle. Will you be able to conquer the climb and reach your goal?

In PathUp!, you’re embarking on an incredible journey to climb to the top. Every step you take presents a unique challenge—narrow paths, steep inclines, and tricky turns that require quick decisions and skill.

Throughout the game, you'll need to combine several mechanics:

  • Boost for speed bursts to overcome difficult sections,

  • Jump to clear obstacles with high jumps,

  • Impulse left / Impulse right for precise adjustments to your path,

  • Reset Car to recover your vehicle if it gets stuck or flips over.

But beware—every mistake has consequences. One wrong move, and you could tumble down. That’s what makes the game so thrilling—you never know what the next move will lead to.

PathUp! is a game that tests your skills in overcoming obstacles by combining mechanics. Can you face the challenges and reach the summit?

There are also two checkpoints in the game to help you maintain your progress. If you find yourself in a tough spot, these checkpoints allow you to return to the last safe position and continue your journey without starting over from scratch.

Start your adventure now—overcome every challenge and reach your ultimate goal!

name: PathUp!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600@ 3.1 GHz or AMD R5 1600X @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 10400 3.1 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 2600x 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

short_description: PathUp is a thrilling adventure game where you climb to the summit, overcoming obstacles using exciting mechanics. Quick decisions and skill are key to progress. Two checkpoints help you continue your journey without starting over.
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Russian, Japanese
